required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind,Placebo-controlled,Phase 3 Trial of Donafenib in 131IRefractory Differentiated Thyroid Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: Donafenib for advanced 131I-refractory/resistant differentiated thyroid cancer(DTC).

detailed_description.textblock: This phase 3 study of donafenib, an oral multikinase inhibitor that targets Raf kinase and receptor tyrosine kinases, is to assess efficacy and safety in patients with 131I-refractory/resistant differentiated thyroid cancer.The study is a randomised,multicentre,double-blind,placebo-controlled,study.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From randomization of the first subject until the last subject complete 24 months treatment
primary_outcome.description: PFS was defined as the time from date of randomization to disease progression radiological or death due to any cause, whichever occurs first. Subjects without progression or death at the time of analysis were censored at their last date of tumor evaluation.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From randomization of the first subject until the last subject complete 48 months treatment
secondary_outcome.description: OS is defined as the time from date of randomization to death due to any cause. Subjects still alive at the time of analysis were censored at their last date of last contact

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From randomization of the first subject until the last subject complete 24 months treatment
secondary_outcome.description: ORR is defined as the percentage of subjects with total number of Complete Response(CR)+total number of Partial Response(PR).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From randomization of the first subject until the last subject complete 24 months treatment
secondary_outcome.description: DCR is defined as the percentage of subjects whose best response was not Progressive Disease (PD) according to Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST) (= total number of Complete Response (CR) + total number of Partial Response (PR) + total number of Stable Disease (SD); CR, PR, or SD had to be maintained for at least 28 days from the first demonstration of that rating)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From randomization of the first subject until the last subject complete 24 months treatment
secondary_outcome.description: TTP was defined as the time from date of randomization to disease progression radiological. Subjects without progression at the time of analysis were censored at their last date of tumor evaluation.

arm_group.description: Donafenib 300mg bid for each 28 days cycle.
Placebo 300mg bid for each 28 days cycle.

intervention.description: after continuing to intolerance or progress in double blind treatment period,for progress but tolerance into open therapy period for Donafenib evaluated by investigator
after continuing to intolerance or progress in double blind treatment period,for progress but tolerance into open therapy period for Donafenib evaluated by investigator
